actions.description: An array of actions describing what the ticket trigger will do

active.description: Whether the ticket trigger is active

conditions.description: An object that describes the circumstances under which the trigger performs its actions

description.description: The description of the ticket trigger

updated_at.description: The time of the last update of the ticket trigger

url.description: The url of the ticket trigger
